ygData.subject: Re: tradeskills
ygData.msgSnippet: ... for ... This isn t true. I have worked on my alcohol tolerance ever since I noticed STR and STA go up during a wedding reception (prior to that I also
ygData.messageBody:
> ok im butting in here, as far as i know the warriors are the ones who get
> the increase in str. i could be wrong but all the warriors i know drink
for
> that reason, since they dont cast, it dont matter for the inturuptions,
> anyway just my 2 cents

This isn't true. I have worked on my alcohol tolerance ever since I noticed
STR and STA go up during a wedding reception (prior to that I also thought
it was a warrior only effect). It's now at 150; only just hit level 30 so I
haven't maxed it yet. Sometimes I can knock a few back and get the STR and
STA buffs without being too drunk to cast, sometimes I can't.

Salt
